title: BSSC Recruitment 2025 -Apply Online for 379 Sports Trainer Posts
description: Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 379 Sports Trainer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the BSSC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the Age limit, Selection Process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website or before th...
